title: TexKart
description: TexKart is a modern textile e-commerce platform enabling seamless buying and selling of fabrics and materials. Built to streamline the textile supply chain for wholesalers and retailers.

title: Hypothalamus
description: Hypothalamus is a health-focused food delivery platform where meals are suggested by doctors based on the user's medical history and dietary needs.

title: Yoco Stays
description: Yoco Stays is a comprehensive hostel management system for student accommodations, handling bookings, payments, and room assignments.
